Anniversary of Bangladeshi Independence observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Bangladeshi Independence observed 
    Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the Chollima House of Culture on Mar. 26 to mark the 32nd anniversary of Bangladeshi Independence.
 The meeting was addressed by Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is vice-chairman of the Korea-Bangladesh Friendship Association.    
 After the meeting the participants looked round the photos introducing Bangladesh.

Greetings to Foreign Minister of Serbia and Montenegro
articles.content:
Greetings to Foreign Minister of Serbia and Montenegro 
    Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, Foreign Minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a message of greetings to Goran Svilanovic upon his appointment as Foreign Minister of Serbia and Montenegro.
 Expressing the belief that the traditional relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, the message wished the foreign minister new success in his responsible work to consolidate the external prestige of the country.
